name: SERPER_API_KEY
description: Key to access google search services

name: OPENAI_API_KEY
description: Key to access openai services v2

name: OPENAI_MODEL
description: The model to be used by openai

name: OPENAI_MAX_TOKENS
description: The max tokens for a response

name: BERT_SCORE_SAMPLING_NUMBER
description: How many times to ask the llm for responses

name: GEVAL_SAMPLING_NUMBER
description: How many times to ask the llm for responses

name: NGRAM_SAMPLING_NUMBER
description: How many times to ask the llm for responses

name: NGRAM_N
description: n: n-gram model, n=1 is Unigram, n=2 is Bigram, etc.

name: CHAINPOLL_SAMPLING_NUMBER
description: How many times to ask the llm for responses
